mahaneni, maithriya mul karagena sitha thula athi karaganna yam wimukthiyak weda..(chethowimukthiya) eya asuru karana , diyunu karana, nithara nithara wadana, nagi yana wahanayak se ee thulatama piwisa wasaya karayida, ada sitina wasthrayak seyin sitha eya samaga nitharama thabaganida, maithri wimukthiyen ma wasaya karayi, eyama hama witama pragunakarayida, ohu hata aanisansayan ekolahak labe... 01.ohu suwase nindata yayi. 02.suwase awadhiweyi 03.napuru sihina nodakiyi. 04.manussayanta priya wu pudgalayeku we. 05.amanussayantada priya wu pudgalayeku we. 06.dewiyangen pawa aarakshawa labayi 07.ginnen wasa wisen awi aayudha walinda, upadrawa noweyi. 08.waha ohuge sitha samadhigatha we. 09.muhune bohoma pahapath penumin yuthuwe. 10.ohu kaluriya karana wita numulasihiyen yuthuwa kaluriya karayi. 11.me jiwithayedi arihathwayata path nowuye nam aanagamiwa bambaalowata pamineyi.
